description:
Another Netflix series cancellation has just been announced. This time, however, the cancellation was made by Netflix to a pretty major series after a mere two seasons. Due to the cancellation, however, only two seasons of this particular series managed to be released by the platform. The reason for being such a major title for [...]

The post Netflix Cancels Beloved Series After Two Seasons appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Netflix Cancels Beloved Series After Two Seasons
